page.title: 17Caldwell Sports JD
page.content: Caldwell Sports is the most important {event}in the village. The sports are on a Saturday in the middle of June. They start at 2.30 p.m. First it is the{Fancy Dress.}This year Watson and David Swinbank won. They were dressed up as a horse. When the{sports}start the age groups are 5 and under, 6-8, 9-11 and 12-16 years. There are some different{races}which are flat race, egg and spoon, sack race, bean bag race, potato race, obstacle race, wheel-barrow race, three-legged, welly throwing and high jump. After the sports it's the ladies' and men's {quoits.}Afterwards it's time to give the{prizes}and David Swinbank won the cup. Later it's the{barbecue.}There are only two barbecues so you have to wait. At the barbecue you can have sausages, beefburgers, chicken, steak chops.
